Two servers accidentally share a prime in their RSA keys. Can you use this flaw to recover the secret message? The ciphertext is: ciphertext1: 655870239995574441692910697803366338465304348118978932311916820231246849710446667430874607947676520149729603829477565099450626346764130569508811754629094, ciphertext2: 6633253846375657122904116249134074867383279780112462986776400157048606966003606204333389280623959048686585543168686213372138611036523790571330915963759473

The flag format is flag{...}
n1=8929853012123585366330841021262923683531792374437943538447917384986282706277096117390882784083870606497918823543407434502886172865540800424858661139387671, n2=8260686341509830198708789457331353676210166873193230459155846067010382300194305842112334416754504588700009537098267628870374189670959366606492661773363267, e=3548463485864757786651745527736194849764582722402933833508417804805387155866255423855089598594200395764772212864017114222651362784996337383748085279620241

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{hox30tm2}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 655870239995574441692910697803366338465304348118978932311916820231246849710446667430874607947676520149729603829477565099450626346764130569508811754629094, ciphertext2: 6633253846375657122904116249134074867383279780112462986776400157048606966003606204333389280623959048686585543168686213372138611036523790571330915963759473
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=8929853012123585366330841021262923683531792374437943538447917384986282706277096117390882784083870606497918823543407434502886172865540800424858661139387671, n2=8260686341509830198708789457331353676210166873193230459155846067010382300194305842112334416754504588700009537098267628870374189670959366606492661773363267, e=3548463485864757786651745527736194849764582722402933833508417804805387155866255423855089598594200395764772212864017114222651362784996337383748085279620241
extra_info: p=110451118257506955345967615797669039953684536972376301486185101814199923350459, q=80848914461005524275913042825788404112924855209308733392714864765845931434069, r=102174363089241797053642261974919300098213169263685974626494929783578617650743, φ(n1)=8929853012123585366330841021262923683531792374437943538447917384986282706276904817358164271604248725839295366099340825110704487830661900458278615284603144, φ(n2)=8260686341509830198708789457331353676210166873193230459155846067010382300194122818834784169433175033395208829394056490845901194962940156811943237224278456
subtype: common_factors
archetype: rsa
